name: IndianNurseryRhyme-NaniTeriMorni
0:
”Alexa, play nani teri morni”
”Alexa, start nani teri morni”
”Alexa, open nani teri morni”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nani teri morni
des:
Indian Nursery Rhymes give you a nani teri morni nursery rhyme.If you want to listen to a indian rhyme or a poem just say "Alexa, play nani teri morni".
Once invoked, Alexa will automatically start the conversation and play the poem. The skills by saying "Alexa, start nani teri morni". After invoking Alexa automatically starts the rhyming poem. Once it is finished you can invoke again by saying "Alexa, play nani teri morni".
The Alexa skill is specially designed for kids of age group 4-13 years old.
We are continuously adding more and more handpicked skills which could bring more value education among them and entertain you.
Your reviews motivate us to build wonderful skills like this one.
We want to hear from you!

For all users in India and the rest parts of the world, the skill responses in Hindi and English audio.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Disclaimer
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This “Indian Nursery rhyme - Nani teri morni” Alexa skill is intended for fun and entertainment purposes only. It contains audio in Indian local language ‘Hindi’ and in 'English'. Users of this skill are fully aware of the local language and accepted to play the poem with their own knowledge and experience.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
